name: The Helpful Angel
description:
This is a Bitsy game for the angel themed game jam! Descend from Heaven in order to help people and lift their sadness!

Not only is this the first game I put on a game jam, it's also the first overall game I ever develop and publish, so make sure to point out any error you notice as you play! Also notice how English is not my native language, so look out for that.
